name: Don't Pop!
description:
Don't Pop! is an Arcade bullet hell where you play as a bubble avoiding being popped by rocket powered fingers!

Features 

  • Dodge increasingly silly and amusing attacks from funny fingers.
  • Try and get a high score, gloat your score to your friends!
  • Blow an adorable bubble around with your mouse
  • Manage your size by collecting bubble liquid

Developed by:

Jacob Gibbins: Design, Programming, Animation, Art

Twitter: @GamedevGibbins

Kieran Stephen: UI Art, Logo 

Twitter: @KieranS_Art
